column6: the  Trapeang Kriel International Police Station conducted a search of an Indonesian at the border checkpoint. In a suitcase they found 4 boxes of methamphetamine
column7: weighing around 1 kg.------The suspect has been named as ABUS ROHMAN
column8: a 34 year old male from  Indonesia.------After questioning
column9: police handed over the suspect to the Anti-Narcotics Bureau of the Stung Treng Provincial Police Office. ------POST NEWS
